name: Average NAEP technology and engineering literacy assessment scores of students in grade 8 and percentage of students scoring proficient or above, by student characteristics: 2014 and 2018
description: Average NAEP technology and engineering literacy assessment scores of students in grade 8 and percentage of students scoring proficient or above, by student characteristics: 2014 and 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_percentage_of_students_scoring_proficient_or_above_2014
variableMeasured.description: Percentage Of Students Scoring Proficient Or Above 2014

variableMeasured.name: field_percentage_of_students_scoring_proficient_or_above_2018
variableMeasured.description: Percentage Of Students Scoring Proficient Or Above 2018

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The scale for NAEP technology and engineering literacy assessment scores is 0–300.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, special tabulations (2018) of the 2014 and 2018 NAEP Technology and Engineering Literacy assessment, National Center for Education Statistics, Department of Education.Science and Engineering Indicators
